Text: Did anyone play this yet?? if so is this legit and virus free?

No, this file isn't legit. This, like every other file on the Pirate Bay, has a virus contained in it. You shouldn't waste your time downloading it and trying yourself, just make yourself look like an idiot and beg for people to try it out for you. The only real way to be safe is to delete your account and never visit this site again.
